title: What’s With Washington: LIVE!
description: A few weeks ago, What’s With Washington went on the road (to NPR’s D.C. headquarters, that is) for our first ever live event. We talked about what makes a good What’s With Washington question! There was a muralist! And there was a Washington-region trivia quiz! Host Mikaela Lefrak grilled WAMU and DCist reporters on their Washington knowledge. On this episode of What's With Washington, highlights from our live event. Take our listener survey: whatswith.org/survey If you LOVE What's With Washington, become a member! Head to wamu.org/donate to support the show and more great podcasts from WAMU. To submit a question, visit wamu.org/whatswith.
